arts.ttl: VfL Bochum vs VfL Wolfsburg preview: Winless runs must end
arts.sum: VfL Bochum and Wolfsburg will both be aiming to snap their winless streaks in the Bundesliga when they square off at Vonovia Ruhrstadion this Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Preview: VfL Bochum vs. Wolfsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between VfL Bochum and Wolfsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
